revision.text:
===Items & Pok√©mon=== ''Note: Enemy Health is calculated using the following formula rounded down:''
\text{Enemy Health} = \text{Floor}[\left ( \frac{100}{12} \times (\text{Battle Frontier Stage} + 10)^{2.2}\right )^{1.15} \times (1 - 0.05)]
revision.comment: Importing a new version from external source
